${ModID}:LosePowerPower.NAME: Lose
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b

CardAugments:IcizePower.NAME: icize
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, mimic a #y%s.

CardAugments:InfinitePower.NAME: Infinite
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add a %s to your hand.

CardAugments:BiasPower.NAME: Biased
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose %d #y%s.

CardAugments:BombPower.NAME: Explosive
DESCRIPTIONS: In #b%1$s turns, play #b%2$s copies of %3$s at the start of your turn.
At the start of next turn, play #b%1$s copies of %2$s.
